main event: A football-shaped object, the size of a softball at first that grew to the size of a beach ball, was observed by 5 witnesses near Lewisburg, Indiana on March 30, 1966.
interesting points: The object pulsed in color, changing from white to flashes of red and blue.
The object emitted a pulsating sound that increased in frequency and volume as it approached the witnesses' car, then decreased as it moved away.
The object maneuvered rapidly, changing direction and altitude before disappearing.
The witnesses were initially skeptical about UFOs but were convinced they saw something unexplained.
The investigating officer was unable to determine the cause of the sighting.
sighted object: football-shaped object that changed size and color
